name: Across the Isle I see
description: This was made for the GMTK game jam, I made it mostly by myself with some help of some friends and it was a blast, Bullet Hells usually require no randomness you need to be in control of your movement because if you don't the game sufferers but what if you remove some of this and make the some walk speed random or make the player jitter, the game becomes much more hectic and adrenaline pumping.
